0.text: Innate: Periodically, Maokai empowers his next basic attack to have an  uncancellable windup and  heal him for 4 − 34 (based on level) (+ 4% − 12% (based on level) maximum health) after a 0.25-second delay.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Maokai empowers his next basic attack to have an uncancellable windup and heal him for 4 − 34 (based on level) (+ 4% − 12% (based on level) maximum health) after a 0.25-second delay.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
heal
(+ 4% − 12% (based on level) maximum health)

1.text: Each time Maokai casts an ability, hits at least one enemy champion or epic monster with  Sapling Toss, or is struck by an enemy's ability, Sap Magic's  cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds, modified to 1.5 if he is hit by a large  monster's basic attack or ability.
1.html: Each time Maokai casts an ability, hits at least one enemy champion or epic monster with Sapling Toss, or is struck by an enemy's ability, Sap Magic's  cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds, modified to 1.5 if he is hit by a large monster's basic attack or ability.
markedPassages: Sapling Toss
cooldown
monster's

2.text: Sap Magic  resets Maokai's basic attack timer, and will not trigger if he is above 95% maximum  health.
2.html: Sap Magic resets Maokai's basic attack timer, and will not trigger if he is above 95% maximum  health.
markedPassages: resets
above 95% maximum  health
health
possibleConcerningAbilities: Sap Magic  resets Maokai's basic attack timer, and will not trigger if he is above 95% maximum  health.

0.text: Active: Maokai sends a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 99% for 0.25 seconds. Bramble Smash deals bonus magic damage to  monsters.
0.html: Active: Maokai sends a shockwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them by 99% for 0.25 seconds. Bramble Smash deals bonus magic damage to monsters.
markedPassages: slows
monsters

1.text: Enemies near Maokai are also  stunned for 0.5 seconds and  knocked back up to 300 units based on their proximity to him.
1.html: Enemies near Maokai are also stunned for 0.5 seconds and knocked back up to 300 units based on their proximity to him.
markedPassages: stunned
knocked back

0.text: Active: Maokai  dashes to the target enemy while being  untargetable. Upon arrival, he deals magic damage and  roots them for a duration.
0.html: Active: Maokai dashes to the target enemy while being untargetable. Upon arrival, he deals magic damage and roots them for a duration.
markedPassages: dashes
untargetable
roots

0.text: Active: Maokai  flings a Sapling to the target location, granting  sight of the area.
0.html: Active: Maokai flings a Sapling to the target location, granting sight of the area.
markedPassages: flings
sight

1.text: Once landed, a Sapling remains stationary for 30 seconds or until it reacts to the first nearby visible enemy, chasing them for up to 2.5 seconds. The Sapling explodes upon colliding with an enemy or when it expires, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 300 against non-champions, and  slowing them by 45% for 2 seconds.
1.html: Once landed, a Sapling remains stationary for 30 seconds or until it reacts to the first nearby visible enemy, chasing them for up to 2.5 seconds. The Sapling explodes upon colliding with an enemy or when it expires, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, capped at 300 against non-champions, and slowing them by 45% for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

2.text: A Sapling placed in  brush instead lasts 30 (+ 2.5% bonus health) seconds, deals double damage to struck non- minion targets over 3 bursts, and  slows them by 45% (+ 1% per 100 bonus health) (+ 1% per 100 AP), as well as  reveals them for 3 seconds. The first instance of damage is dealt instantly and the second and third instances occur each 0.75 seconds thereafter. The total damage is capped at 600 against non-champions.
2.html: A Sapling placed in brush instead lasts 30 (+ 2.5% bonus health) seconds, deals double damage to struck non- minion targets over 3 bursts, and slows them by 45% (+ 1% per 100 bonus health) (+ 1% per 100 AP), as well as reveals them for 3 seconds. The first instance of damage is dealt instantly and the second and third instances occur each 0.75 seconds thereafter. The total damage is capped at 600 against non-champions.
markedPassages: brush
minion
slows
reveals

3.text: See Pets for more details about Saplings.
3.html: See Pets for more details about Saplings.

0.text: Active: Maokai summons a colossal wall of five thorny brambles that slowly advances in the target direction, accelerating over time, each stopping when they collide with an enemy  champion. Hitting at least one enemy champion grants Maokai  bonus movement speed decaying over 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Maokai summons a colossal wall of five thorny brambles that slowly advances in the target direction, accelerating over time, each stopping when they collide with an enemy champion. Hitting at least one enemy champion grants Maokai  bonus movement speed decaying over 2 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
bonus movement speed

1.text: Each bramble deals magic damage to enemies hit and  roots them for 0.8 − 2.6 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
1.html: Each bramble deals magic damage to enemies hit and roots them for 0.8 − 2.6 (based on distance traveled) seconds.
markedPassages: roots
